description: The Digital Transformation Branch of Health Canada requires a Special Advisor to assist and provide support towards the implementation of a Digital Strategy for Health Canada and the Public Health Agency of Canada. The Special Advisor will plan, attend and collaborate with stakeholders to support the analysis and development of the Digital Strategy and associated plans, roadmaps, standards and processes.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Contract Number: cb-819-45638920
### Modification Number: 5

#### Tender Title
**Special Advisor - Advanced**

#### Tender Description

Health Canada is seeking a qualified contractor to provide special advisor services under a Supply Arrangement. The required services include:

Providing expertise and support to develop a Digital Strategy for Health Canada and the Public Health Agency of Canada.
Collaborating with stakeholders and analyzing data to support the development of plans, roadmaps, standards, and processes.

### Contract Details
* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
* **Contracting Entity**: Health Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 200 Eglantine Driveway, Tunney's Pasture, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9

### Service Requirements
* **Estimated Time of Effort**: 48 weeks
* **Number of Resources Required**: 1
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is open to suppliers who have been prequalified under EN578-172870, specifically under the Policy and Advisory Professional Services stream, category 13.9 Special Advisor - Advanced.

### Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Jason Genier
* **Contact Email**: jason.genier@hc-sc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: (613) 327-0596

### Tender Documents
The tender documents are available at the following location:
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25014/npp-english--ths_rfp_1000255127.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25014/npp-english--ths_rfp_1000255127.pdf)

The tender closing date is November 28, 2023 at 14:00:00. Please check the Canada Buys website for updates on the tender status. [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/supplier-professional-development/tenders-tap-doctions/Canada](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/supplier-professional-development/tenders-tap-doctions/Canada)
